evidence.claim: Amivie uses AWS services including Lambda and S3 for their application infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards for interoperability with various EHR systems.
Amivie handles HIPAA-compliant data exchange via X12 EDI transaction sets.
Integration patterns include event-driven architecture for scalable solutions.
Amivie leverages microservices architecture in their cloud environment.

icp.icp_reason: Amivie leverages multiple X12 transactions in their healthcare data exchange offerings.
matched_use_cases: X12 EDI 276/277 for claim status transactions
